**Assignment** is very close to an ==article==|link:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/quizzes/#article|. The difference is, that this is a "quiz" and therefore has an instruction property. The distinction is important for display, sharing, ...

bit.body: **Assignment** is very close to an ==article==|link:https://docs.bitmark.cloud/quizzes/#article|. The difference is, that this is a "quiz" and therefore has an instruction property. The distinction is important for display, sharing, ...
